text:
Someone asked me how feasible is it to integrate third party api into "HubSpot CRM", is it even possible, like to use yoti-doc-scan in CRM?
this is my first time on HubSpot ever.

Hi everyone! We’re thinking about making the switch to HubSpot and currently testing different features…

We’re curious (and forgive me if this is posted in the wrong channel), what service/integration do you recommend for SMS & calling within the CRM? We’re looking for the most native but customizable approach, where our sales agents can make and receive inbound calls on their own designated numbers, as well as have the ability to send text messages to their contacts from the same phone number directly in the CRM. Would also like to be able to create workflows that send text messages on behalf of our sales agents from their designated phone numbers.

Thank! :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi - does anyone know if it's possible to show some rich text content at the top of a specific tag listing page?

for example: I'd want the content to appear on <https://blog.website.com/tag/yes>

but not on <https://blog.website.com/tag/no>
Has anyone run into this error with the HubSpot Zoom integration? Where people are registering on the HubSpot form but the registrations aren't making it to zoom?

Hi All. Not sure if there is anyone in here available to help but, I am working in an Enterprise account on our first serverless function. When I upload my serverless.json I get the following error:
`CMS Hub Enterprise is required to use serverless functions`

I can confirm it is an Enterprise account


Any assistance is greatly appreciated.

Hey Ivan, that account is a Marketing Hub Enterprise account, CMS Hub is different from Marketing Hub.
<https://www.HubSpot.com/pricing/cms?term=annual>

Quick CTA question: how do you link a CTA to a staged paged? we are working on rolling out a new site and there a bunch of CTA’s that need to be created, but it looks like you can only link to live content, not staged content
